title: Hey Riot, Yasuo's Q goes through Jax's dodge when he's the only/first target being hit
body:
Please fix this

I've made threads about this before but still no reply

replies.body:
>but still no reply

That's because Yasuos Q is not an Auto attack.
Its an AoE.

Deflect doesn't protect from AoE.

Working as intended.

zzzzz

Anything that applies on hit effects is supposed to be dodged/blocked/affected by blind

I can't believe I have to explain this every time

Runaan's AAs are dodged

In fact Yasuo's Q is blocked by Pantheon, so why tf isn't it dodged

>Anything that applies on hit effects is supposed to be dodged/blocked/affected by blind

No, its not.
Anything that is an AUTOATTACK or enhanced AUTOATTACK (such as NasusQ) is affected by blind/dodge
Yasuos Q does apply on-hit effects, but its not an auto-attack.

>Runaan's AAs are dodged

Because those are AAs, not AoE.

>In fact Yasuo's Q is blocked by Pantheon, so why tf isn't it dodged

Because Pantheons Block mechanic specifically blocks all ABILITIES that can apply on hit effects, including autoattacks


>I can't believe I have to explain this every time

_Aegis Protection does not consistently negate on-hit effects attached to basic attacks, but will negate abilities that apply them_
